title: A young girls journey to the other side of the world
creator_credit: Maria Sourtzis and ACMI Digital Storytelling
brief_description: This is a story of migration through the eyes of a young girl. Maria recounts the long journey by boat, the memories of Bonegilla migrant reception centre and her early life in Melbourne.
title_for_label: A young girls journey to the other side of the world
